amendment.description: Amendment sought to waive HUD regulations to allow the conversion of a 70-unit multifamily housing complex in Madison, Wisconsin, from low-income to mix-income housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of July 24 and made in order pursuant to the rule, to waive HUD regulations to allow the conversion of a 70-unit multifamily housing complex in Madison, Wisconsin, from low-income to mix-income housing. The development is currently occupied by tenants under HUD Section 8 low income housing assistance regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 348 (Roll no. 591).
